Key Match Events: Curry recorded a triple-double with 36 points, 5 rebounds, and 7 assists
He scored 25 points in the final two quarters
Kuminga scored 20 points off the bench
Melton had 19 points, 10 rebounds, and 3 steals
Wiggins added 18 points, 8 rebounds, 5 assists, and 3 steals
Pre-Game Insights: Curry is averaging 19.7 points, 4.5 rebounds, 6.2 assists, and 2.0 steals per game
Golden State's impressive depth is led by Buddy Hield off the bench
Steve Kerr is using a 12-man rotation that seems to be working
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors improved to 8-2 for the season
The Thunder's first defeat of the season came at the Paycom Center
Miscellaneous Highlights: Curry scored his first bucket with a rolling layup at the 5:38 mark in the first quarter
He hit two 3-point shots in the first half to help the Warriors build a lead
Curry torched the OKC Thunder with 17 points in the third quarter
The OKC Thunder bench came alive and trimmed the lead in the fourth quarter
